channel.title: Help Please... + GF MOPARSCAPE MODS!

item.title: Help Please... + GF MOPARSCAPE MODS!
item.dc:creator: @nd_w0t nd w0t
item.description:
@nd_w0t wrote:

Nice, you completely removed my posts… ive been gone for 2 hours lol, and looked upto page 40… on both SECTIONS… Help, and QUESTIONS… no way could they have gone further…

They were VERY simple questions…

1st) In the top right hand corner of my server, there is a flashing box… It says stuff like “Alchemy” “Pizzazz points ETC…” There were posts back to say, “(Its probably your main menu)” ** Answer to that question = Main menu information, is in client.java… i have searched every word that it says in the flashing box, in client.java… Nothing IS THERE! **…
Another was, check your other files… ** Answer to that = Lol? there are many files-.-… **
C’mon Someone must know!!!.. Please… Lol i will stop posting if someone just helps me?

2nd)

if(command.startsWith("setname"))
{
	currentTarget = command.substring(8);

} else if(command.startsWith("trgtalk")) {
	client theGuy = (client)server.playerHandler.players[getCurrID()];
	theGuy.txt4 = command.substring(8);
	theGuy.string4UpdateRequired = true;
}

This code below, goes above boolean process

public int getCurrID()
{
	int theID = 0;
	for(int l = 0; l < server.playerHandler.players.length; l++)
		if(server.playerHandler.players[l] != null)
			if(server.playerHandler.players[l].playerName == currentTarget)
				theID = l;
			else
				theID = playerId;
return theID;
}

So, anyone any ideas to any of them??
If you do post, please make it helpful, dont complain and say, “Wow no wonder your posts have been removed” or “Stop acting like a stupid nub” If your gonna flame me for what im doing, do it in PM…
Start your posts with
1st) or 2nd) to answer…
– PS – I will not stop posting untill i have both these sorted…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 07:40:16 PM[/size][hr]…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 15, 2007, 08:12:55 PM[/size][hr]anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 10:03:24 AM[/size][hr]=S?[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 11:55:51 AM[/size][hr]Wow…[br][size=1]Posted on: August 16, 2007, 04:13:52 PM[/size][hr]ANYONE OMFG!!!"?"
